external_games.name: Koufuku wo Yobu Game: Dora Dora Dora

name: Koufuku wo Yobu Game: Dora Dora Dora
summary: Koufuku wo Yobu Game: Dora Dora Dora is a Mahjong video game released on the Nintendo Famicom in 1991. This game allows you to play traditional Mahjong games against a computer or to play an RPG adventure in which you fight enemies by playing rounds of Mahjong.
